payload:
# PROMPT: Ship Combat Capability Accuracy Follow-up

## Objective
Implement the follow-up phase to improve Dogma combat capability parity against pyfa for currently surfaced metrics, prioritizing T3 cruisers first and T3 destroyers second.

## Spec Reference
Use `specs/improve-accuracy-of-ship-combat-capability/` as the source of truth:
- `requirements.md`
- `research/*.md`
- `design.md`
- `plan.md`

## Preconditions
- Start only after the current in-progress Ralph task is completed/merged.

## ... [truncated, 2850 chars total]
completed task-1771422162-55b2: AC1 follow-up entry gate CLI, targeted/full tests + build green, commit 047d4e4
completed task-1771422170-9013: baseline 10pct summary artifacts + CLI wiring + tests/build green, commit 8009613
completed task-1771422170-3931: follow-up fit+hull gate evaluator, tests/build green, commit e4139ac

payload.note: deterministic follow-up prioritization backlog implemented; tests/build green
scoped new-fit blocker diagnostics aligned; targeted/full tests and build green
t3 cruiser corpus/reference expanded to >=10 per hull with new regression coverage; targeted/full tests and build green

implemented cruiser mechanic-cluster parity fixes (polarized/civilian/subsystem/reactive) with new strict cruiser regression test; npm test and build passed; residual Legion/Proteus gate closure tracked in task-1771425729-84f6
aligned reactive hardener with pyfa equilibrium, expanded Legion/Proteus cruiser regressions, cruiser phase now 10/10 per hull, npm test and build passed
expanded destroyer corpus+references, added destroyer coverage/gate regressions, aligned tactical destroyer defense by hull family, follow-up baseline now complete
ran final baseline+test+build verification, corrected v0.2.9 changelog history boundary, and closed follow-up final verification task
T3 cruiser and destroyer follow-up gates verified complete (>=10 passing fits per hull), final verification order passed, changelog updated through bfdf636.
